name: Colworth Science Park
overview:
Colworth Science Park has a world-class reputation for business relevant science and the development of innovative products. Onsite is a diverse and open community where collaboration and interaction are part of the campus culture.

The site is host to a number of R&D organisations that benefit from access to a significant range of specialist services directly relevant to the science industry.

Colworth Science Park has been the location of one of Unilever’s foremost R&D centres for over 55 years.
